microprocessor.name: SRC-TCP [System] Hub v1.4.0.3
microprocessor.description: Can be used to connect multiple modules to the main controller. Multiple Hubs can be chained

node.label: Main Input
node.description: To Main Input on Main Controller (or other hub if chaining)

node.label: Slot 1
node.description: Allows the connection of any module as long as it's ID and channels are defined. Also allows for chaining hubs

node.label: Slot 2
node.description: Allows the connection of any module as long as it's ID and channels are defined. Also allows for chaining hubs

node.label: Slot 3
node.description: Allows the connection of any module as long as it's ID and channels are defined. Also allows for chaining hubs
